title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a spaceman figure supplants him as top toy.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to find him.

title: Shrek
description: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of an ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess.

title: Moana
description: In Ancient Polynesia, a spirited daughter of a chief answers the Ocean's call to seek out the demigod Maui.

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with counterparts from other dimensions.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes tries to live the quiet suburban life, but are forced into action to save the world.

title: Up
description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons.

title: WALL-E
description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel teams up with charming trickster Hector on an extraordinary journey through the Land of the Dead.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his army from enslaving humanity.

title: Iron Man
description: After being held captive, billionaire industrialist Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit to fight evil.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America.

title: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard and sent to live amongst humans on Earth.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: Wonder Woman
description: When an Amazon princess comes to the world of Man to stop a war, she discovers her full powers and true destiny.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry and learns the truth about himself, his family and his terrible fate.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of Hogwarts.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion
description: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

title: The Princess Bride
description: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles and enemies.

title: Home Alone
description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone.

title: Mrs. Doubtfire
description: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children.

title: The Mask
description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Jumanji
description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades and a host of dangers.

title: The Goonies
description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's treasure.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

title: The Karate Kid
description: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

title: School of Rock
description: After being kicked out of his rock band, guitarist Dewey Finn faces a mountain of debts and depression.

title: Matilda
description: Story of a brilliant young girl whose senseless and foolish parents completely ignore her.

title: A Bug's Life
description: A misfit ant looks for warriors to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers.

title: Monsters Inc
description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

title: Cars
description: A hotshot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs.

title: Brave
description: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom.

title: Tangled
description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower.

title: Zootopia
description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together.

title: Big Hero 6
description: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself.

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance.

title: The Secret Life of Pets
description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray from the pound.

title: Despicable Me
description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme.

title: Minions
description: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who plots to take over the world.

title: The Jungle Book
description: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery.

title: Alice in Wonderland
description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
description: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world.

title: The BFG
description: A girl named Sophie encounters the Big Friendly Giant who brings her to Giant Country.
